pages.title: Stoneage - How Retro
pages.text: The latent magicks here have some strange effects, as you've already seen, yet none so peculiar as the conflict of $(item)Lava$() and $(item)Water$(). In an even fight, they'll produce an infinite supply of $(item)Cobblestone$() as they war, yet if $(item)Water$() gets the advantage and contacts the source of the $(item)Lava$(), it will turn it into hardened $(item)Obsidian$().
